instructions.title: How to use Lorem Ipsum Generator

steps.title: Choose generation type
steps.description: Select whether you want to generate words, sentences, or paragraphs. Each type is suited for different design needs.

steps.title: Set the amount
steps.description: Use the slider to specify how much text you need. You can generate up to 500 words, 50 sentences, or 20 paragraphs.

steps.title: Select text style
steps.description: Choose from classic Lorem Ipsum, original Cicero text, Tech/Developer jargon, Hipster Ipsum, or Corporate Buzzwords.

steps.title: Configure output format
steps.description: Select Plain Text for simple copy-paste, HTML for web pages with paragraph tags, or Markdown for documentation.

steps.title: Generate and copy
steps.description: Click Generate to create your placeholder text, then copy it to clipboard or download as a file.
